name: Locked Potential
description:
§7Once you get used to your new found Powers at §aLVL 50§7, you can become a Berserker, Blood Hunter or Blood Knight! 
 §4Berserker §7focus on dealing Damage and will get a Rage State that they can toggle, which increases their physical Powers, but stops them from healing naturally. 
 §5Blood Hunters §7can sacrifice their stored Blood to apply Curses onto a Target. 
 §1Blood Knights §7are invincible while using a Shield, rendering them unable to move and act.
